name: Antibody (itch)
description:
-Xbox controller needed

Destroy viruses from the inside, dodge their defenses and strike the core.
Use the recoil of your bullets to move around !

Accessibility:
-You only need the joystick and one button to play.
-Colourblind people should be able to play this game without trouble

Made in 4 days by @noisegrrrl & @Paul_Maurer
